name: database-schemas
description: JSON Schema definitions for biological database entities

scripts.validate: npm run validate:schemas && npm run validate:examples
scripts.validate:schemas: ajv validate --spec=draft2020 -s schemas/mixins.json && ajv validate --spec=draft2020 -s schemas/User.json && ajv validate --spec=draft2020 -s schemas/Donor.json && ajv validate --spec=draft2020 -s schemas/Biosample.json
scripts.validate:examples: npm run validate:user-examples && npm run validate:donor-examples && npm run validate:biosample-examples

author: gabdank
